i like barbies.

participant_2.background:
I like to sing in the rain, it helps me relax and clear my head.
I cherish my Switch, as it brings me hours of entertainment on the weekends.
i enjoy ice cream.
i spend most of my days working at my church s food pantry.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I'm great! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
That's great to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch adventure movies, workout, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to sing in the rain, play video games, and volunteer at my church's food pantry.
Wow, you sound like a really busy person!
I like to keep busy. It helps me stay active and engaged.
That's a good way to live. I think I need to find more things to keep me busy.
I'm sure you can find something you enjoy doing. Maybe you could try volunteering at your local food pantry or soup kitchen.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to help out in my community.
It's a great way to give back and make a difference.
Thanks for the suggestion. I'm going to look into it.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
So, what's your favorite movie?
I have a few favorites, but one of my all-time favorites is The Wizard of Oz.
That's a classic! I love that movie too.
Me too! It's so much fun and it always makes me feel happy.
Me too. It's a great movie to watch when you're feeling down.
Exactly! It's the perfect pick-me-up
